forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 33. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 24. Southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
As night envelopes Boston, the city sleeps under a quilt of tranquility. The skies remain mostly clear, allowing the glow of the city to reflect upon the shimmering expanse below. With temperatures gently dipping towards a brisk 24 degrees, a light southwest wind dances through the streets, whispering secrets of the day just passed. In this serene evening, there is no trace of fog, only the crisp clarity that heralds the onset of winter.

Tomorrow promises a welcome embrace of sunlight, casting warmth onto the chilled landscape. Expect a bright winter day with a high nearing 33 degrees, creating a delightful contrast to the starkness of the season. This is a day that invites you to step outside, to savor a brisk walk along the Charles or perhaps to gather at a favored café, where the steam from your coffee uplifts the senses. Dressing in layers will serve you well; a warm coat with a light scarf will fend off the evening chill, while a wool cap could provide just the comfort needed for those moments spent outside. Boston, in its wintery disposition, beckons you for a gentle rendezvous with its winter charm.
